mapper.sql: SEQ_ID, createuser, createtime, usercode, costno, itemno, itemname, unit, unitprice, num, discount, subtotal, arrearmoney, paymoney, voidmoney, askperson, doctor, status, remark, regno, qfbh, kaifa, payxj, payyjj, paybank, payyb, payother1, payother2, payother3, istsxm, y2, isqfreal, istk, payzfb, paywx, issplit, organization, paymmd, paybdfq, paydjq, backid, isyjjitem, payintegral, zltime, czperson
mapper.insert: insert into KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL (SEQ_ID, createuser, createtime, usercode, costno, itemno, itemname, unit, unitprice, num, discount, subtotal, arrearmoney, paymoney, voidmoney, askperson, doctor, status, remark, regno, qfbh, kaifa, payxj, payyjj, paybank, payyb, payother1, payother2, payother3, istsxm, y2, isqfreal, istk, payzfb, paywx, issplit, organization, paymmd, paybdfq, paydjq, backid, isyjjitem, payintegral, zltime, czperson ) values (#{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{costno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subtotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{arrearmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paymoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{voidmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{askperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qfbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kaifa,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payxj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payyjj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paybank,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payyb,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payother1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payother2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payother3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{istsxm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{y2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isqfreal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{istk,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payzfb,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paywx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{issplit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymmd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paybdfq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paydjq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{backid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isyjjitem,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payintegral,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zltime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{czperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL
createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
usercode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
costno = #{costno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
itemno = #{itemno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
itemname = #{itemname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unitprice = #{unitprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
num = #{num,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
discount = #{discount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subtotal = #{subtotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
arrearmoney = #{arrearmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
paymoney = #{paymoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
voidmoney = #{voidmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
askperson = #{askperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
doctor = #{doctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
regno = #{regno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qfbh = #{qfbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
kaifa = #{kaifa,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
payxj = #{payxj,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
payyjj = #{payyjj,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
paybank = #{paybank,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
payyb = #{payyb,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
payother1 = #{payother1,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
payother2 = #{payother2,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
payother3 = #{payother3,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
istsxm = #{istsxm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
y2 = #{y2,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
isqfreal = #{isqfreal,jdbcType=INTEGER},
istk = #{istk,jdbcType=INTEGER},
payzfb = #{payzfb,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
paywx = #{paywx,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
issplit = #{issplit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paymmd = #{paymmd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
paybdfq = #{paybdfq,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
paydjq = #{paydjq,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
backid = #{backid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isyjjitem = #{isyjjitem,jdbcType=INTEGER},
payintegral = #{payintegral,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
zltime = #{zltime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
czperson = #{czperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL set createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usercode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, costno = #{costno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemno = #{itemno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemname = #{itemname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unitprice = #{unitprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, num = #{num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, discount = #{discount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subtotal = #{subtotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, arrearmoney = #{arrearmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, paymoney = #{paymoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, voidmoney = #{voidmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, askperson = #{askperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor = #{doctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, regno = #{regno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qfbh = #{qfbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, kaifa = #{kaifa,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payxj = #{payxj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, payyjj = #{payyjj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, paybank = #{paybank,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, payyb = #{payyb,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, payother1 = #{payother1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, payother2 = #{payother2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, payother3 = #{payother3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, istsxm = #{istsxm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, y2 = #{y2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, isqfreal = #{isqfreal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, istk = #{istk,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payzfb = #{payzfb,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, paywx = #{paywx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, issplit = #{issplit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paymmd = #{paymmd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, paybdfq = #{paybdfq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, paydjq = #{paydjq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, backid = #{backid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isyjjitem = #{isyjjitem,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payintegral = #{payintegral,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, zltime = #{zltime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, czperson = #{czperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from
where 1=1
and ${key} = #{val}

select.if: select * from KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL where qfbh = #{qfbh} and seq_id != #{seqId} order by createtime desc limit 0,1
select top 1 * from KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL where qfbh = #{qfbh} and seq_id != #{seqId} order by createtime desc
select * from KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL where qfbh = #{_parameter} order by createtime desc limit 0,1
select top 1 * from KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL where qfbh = #{_parameter} order by createtime desc

mapper.select: select seq_id from KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL where qfbh = #{_parameter}
select count(1) from KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL where itemno in(#{_parameter})
select * from KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL where costno = #{costno}
mapper.update:
UPDATE KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL
kaifa = #{kaifa,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zltime = #{zltime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SEQ_ID = #{seqId}
mapper.select: select detail.y2 from KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL detail LEFT JOIN KQDS_COSTORDER cost on cost.costno = detail.costno where qfbh=#{_parameter} and detail.costno!='' and cost.status = 2

select year(sftime) y,month(sftime) m,day(sftime) d, (sum(d.subtotal) - sum(d.voidmoney)) as ys from KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL d LEFT JOIN KQDS_COSTORDER c on d.costno=c.costno where 1=1 and year(sftime) = #{year} and month(sftime) = #{month} and c.status = '2' and c.organization = #{organization} and d.isyjjitem !=1 group by year(sftime),month(sftime),day(sftime)

select year(sftime) y,month(sftime) m,day(sftime) d, sum(d.subtotal) as ss from KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL d LEFT JOIN KQDS_COSTORDER c on d.costno=c.costno where 1=1 and year(sftime) = #{year} and month(sftime) = #{month} and c.status = '2' and c.organization = #{organization} and d.isyjjitem !=1 group by year(sftime),month(sftime),day(sftime)

select (sum(d.subtotal) - sum(d.voidmoney)) as ys from KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL d LEFT JOIN KQDS_COSTORDER c on d.costno=c.costno where 1=1 and year(sftime) = #{year} and month(sftime) = #{month} and c.status = '2' and c.organization = #{organization} and d.isyjjitem !=1

select sum(d.subtotal) as ss from KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL d LEFT JOIN KQDS_COSTORDER c on d.costno=c.costno where 1=1 and year(sftime) = #{year} and month(sftime) = #{month} and c.status = '2' and c.organization = #{organization} and d.isyjjitem !=1

select sum(detail.payxj) as xj, sum(detail.paybank) as bank, sum(detail.payyb) as yb, sum(detail.paywx)as wx, sum(detail.payzfb)as zfb, sum(detail.paymmd)as mmd, sum(detail.paybdfq)as bdfq, sum(detail.payother1) as other1, sum(detail.payyjj) as yjj, sum(detail.payother2) as zs, sum(detail.paydjq) as djq, sum(detail.payintegral) as integral from KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL detail where 1=1
and detail.costno=#{costno}
mapper.delete: delete from KQDS_CostOrder_Detail where costno = '' and status!=1 and isqfreal!=1 and usercode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
delete from KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL where costno = '' and paymoney=0 and status!=1 and isqfreal!=1
mapper.select: select SEQ_ID,createuser,createtime,usercode,costno,itemno,itemname,unit,unitprice,num,discount, subtotal,arrearmoney,paymoney,voidmoney,doctor,status,remark,regno,qfbh,kaifa,payxj,paybank,payyb, payother1,payother3,istsxm,y2,isqfreal,istk,payzfb,paywx,issplit,organization,paymmd,paybdfq, backid,zltime,czperson,parentid from KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL where usercode in (${_parameter})

SELECT a askperson,SUM(paymoney-jcfmoney-yjjmoney) paymoney,SUM(jcfmoney) jcfmoney,SUM (yjjmoney) yjjmoney FROM ( SELECT p.askperson a, (p.actualmoney -(SELECT ISNULL(SUM (paymoney),0) AS paymoney FROM KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL WHERE 1 = 1 AND isyjjitem = 1 AND costno = p.costno)) paymoney, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM (paymoney - payyjj - payother2 - payintegral - paydjq),0) AS paymoney FROM KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL WHERE 1=1 AND itemname IN (SELECT treatitemname FROM KQDS_TREATITEM WHERE basetype = 'jyk671' AND nexttype = 'b87aa149-a257-4b00-8fad-2c9b331af38e' ) AND costno=p.costno) jcfmoney, ISNULL(SUM (costd.payyjj),0) AS yjjmoney, p.costno c FROM KQDS_REG r LEFT JOIN KQDS_PAYCOST p on r.seq_id=p.regno LEFT JOIN KQDS_COSTORDER cost ON p.costno = cost.costno LEFT JOIN KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL costd ON p.costno = costd.costno where 1 = 1 AND r.recesort in (${recesort}) AND YEAR (cost.sftime) >= #{startyear} AND YEAR (cost.sftime) <= #{endyear} AND r.organization = #{organization} AND cost.isdrugs = 0
AND (${askperson})
group by p.askperson, p.actualmoney, p.costno ) as pay group by a ORDER BY a ASC

SELECT a askperson,SUM(paymoney) drugsmoney FROM ( SELECT p.askperson a, (p.actualmoney -(SELECT ISNULL(SUM (paymoney),0) AS paymoney FROM KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL WHERE 1 = 1 AND isyjjitem = 1 AND costno = p.costno )-( SELECT ISNULL( SUM (payyjj + payother2 + payintegral + paydjq),0) AS paymoney FROM KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL WHERE 1 = 1 AND costno = p.costno ) ) paymoney, p.costno c FROM KQDS_REG r LEFT JOIN KQDS_PAYCOST p on r.seq_id=p.regno LEFT JOIN KQDS_COSTORDER cost ON p.costno = cost.costno where 1 = 1 AND YEAR (cost.sftime) >= #{startyear} AND YEAR (cost.sftime) <= #{endyear} AND r.organization = #{organization} AND cost.isdrugs = 1
AND (${askperson})
group by p.askperson, p.actualmoney, p.costno ) as pay group by a ORDER BY a ASC

SELECT cccc 年,rrr 月,SUM(totalMoney) totalMoney FROM ( SELECT YEAR (detail.createtime) cccc, MONTH (detail.createtime) rrr, (cost.actualmoney -(SELECT ISNULL(SUM (paymoney - payyjj - payother2 - payintegral - paydjq),0) AS paymoney FROM KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL WHERE 1=1 AND itemname IN ( SELECT treatitemname FROM KQDS_TREATITEM WHERE basetype = 'jyk671' AND nexttype = 'b87aa149-a257-4b00-8fad-2c9b331af38e' ) AND costno = cost.costno) -( SELECT ISNULL( SUM ( paymoney - payyjj - payother2 - payintegral - paydjq ), 0 ) AS paymoney FROM KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL WHERE 1 = 1 AND isyjjitem=1 AND costno = cost.costno ) ) AS totalMoney FROM KQDS_COSTORDER detail LEFT JOIN KQDS_PAYCOST cost ON cost.costno = detail.costno WHERE 1=1 AND detail.isdrugs != '1' AND MONTH (detail.createtime) >= #{startmonth} AND MONTH (detail.createtime) <= #{endmonth}
and (${years})
AND cost.askperson in (${askperson})
AND detail.organization = #{organization} GROUP BY cost.actualmoney, cost.costno, cost.usercode, YEAR (detail.createtime), MONTH (detail.createtime) ) as pay group by cccc,rrr ORDER BY rrr ASC

SELECT YEAR(detail.createtime) 年, MONTH(detail.createtime) 月, SUM(detail.paymoney) as totalMoney FROM KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL detail LEFT JOIN KQDS_COSTORDER cost ON cost.costno = detail.costno WHERE detail.itemno != '1' AND cost.cjstatus = '1' and cost.isdrugs = '1' and cost.status = '2' and MONTH (detail.createtime) >= #{startmonth} and MONTH (detail.createtime) <= #{endmonth}
and (${years})
AND detail.askperson in (${askperson})
AND detail.organization = #{organization} GROUP BY YEAR (detail.createtime), MONTH (detail.createtime) ORDER BY MONTH (detail.createtime) ASC

SELECT YEAR(detail.createtime) 年, MONTH(detail.createtime) 月, SUM(detail.paymoney) as totalMoney FROM KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL detail LEFT JOIN KQDS_COSTORDER cost ON cost.costno = detail.costno WHERE detail.itemno != '1' AND cost.cjstatus = '1' and cost.status = '2' and MONTH (detail.createtime) >= #{startmonth} and MONTH (detail.createtime) <= #{endmonth}
and (${years})
AND detail.askperson in (${askperson})
AND itemno IN ( SELECT treatitemno FROM KQDS_TREATITEM WHERE 1=1 AND basetype = 'jyk671' AND nexttype = 'b87aa149-a257-4b00-8fad-2c9b331af38e' ) AND detail.organization = #{organization} GROUP BY YEAR (detail.createtime), MONTH (detail.createtime) ORDER BY MONTH (detail.createtime) ASC

SELECT YEAR(detail.createtime) 年, MONTH(detail.createtime) 月, SUM(subtotal) as totalMoney FROM KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL detail LEFT JOIN KQDS_COSTORDER cost ON cost.costno = detail.costno WHERE detail.isyjjitem = '1' and cost.status = '2' and MONTH (detail.createtime) >= #{startmonth} and MONTH (detail.createtime) <= #{endmonth}
and (${years})
AND detail.askperson in (${askperson})
AND detail.organization = #{organization} GROUP BY YEAR (detail.createtime), MONTH (detail.createtime) ORDER BY MONTH (detail.createtime) ASC

SELECT YEAR(detail.createtime) 年, MONTH(detail.createtime) 月, SUM(subtotal) as totalMoney FROM KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL detail LEFT JOIN KQDS_COSTORDER cost ON cost.costno = detail.costno WHERE detail.isyjjitem = '1' AND cost.cjstatus = '1' and cost.status = '2' and MONTH (detail.createtime) >= #{startmonth} and MONTH (detail.createtime) <= #{endmonth}
and (${years})
AND detail.askperson in (${askperson})
AND detail.organization = #{organization} GROUP BY YEAR (detail.createtime), MONTH (detail.createtime) ORDER BY MONTH (detail.createtime) ASC

SELECT year, month, SUM (paymoney) AS performance FROM ( SELECT YEAR(r.createtime) AS year, MONTH(r.createtime) AS month, s.USER_NAME AS doctor, ( p.actualmoney - ( SELECT ISNULL( SUM ( paymoney - payyjj - payother2 - payintegral - paydjq ), 0 ) AS paymoney FROM KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL WHERE 1 = 1 AND itemname IN ( SELECT treatitemname FROM KQDS_TREATITEM WHERE basetype = 'jyk671' AND nexttype = 'b87aa149-a257-4b00-8fad-2c9b331af38e' ) AND costno = p.costno ) - ( SELECT ISNULL( SUM ( paymoney - payyjj - payother2 - payintegral - paydjq ), 0 ) AS paymoney FROM KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL WHERE 1 = 1 AND isyjjitem = 1 AND costno = p.costno ) ) paymoney, p.costno AS costno FROM KQDS_REG r LEFT JOIN KQDS_PAYCOST p ON r.seq_id = p.regno LEFT JOIN KQDS_COSTORDER cost ON p.costno = cost.costno LEFT JOIN sys_person s ON cost.doctor = s.SEQ_ID WHERE 1 = 1
and (${years})
AND MONTH (r.createtime) >= #{startmonth} AND MONTH (r.createtime) <= #{endmonth} AND r.organization = #{organization} AND r.cjstatus = 1 AND cost.isdrugs = 0 AND r.askperson IN (${askperson}) GROUP BY r.createtime, s.USER_NAME, p.actualmoney, p.costno ) AS detail GROUP BY year, month
